src/configuration.ts

ts
import { Configuration, App } from "@midwayjs/decorator";
import { join } from "path";
import * as file from "@cool-midway/file";

@Configuration({
  imports: [file],
  importConfigs: [join(__dirname, "./config")],
})
export class ContainerLifeCycle {
  @App()
  app: koa.Application;

  async onReady() {}
}

ä¸Šä¼ æ¨¡å¼ â€‹

å‰ç«¯éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®æœåŠ¡ç«¯é…ç½®çš„ä¸Šä¼ æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œåˆ‡æ¢è‡ªå·±çš„ä¸Šä¼ æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè·å¾—ä¸Šä¼ æ¨¡å¼

ts
import { Get, Inject, Post, Provide } from "@midwayjs/decorator";
import { CoolController, BaseController } from "@cool-midway/core";
import { Context } from "koa";
import { CoolFile } from "@cool-midway/file";

/**
 * æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
 */
@Provide()
@CoolController()
export class AppDemoFileController extends BaseController {
  @Inject()
  ctx: Context;

  @Inject()
  file: CoolFile;

  @Get("/uploadMode", { summary: "è·å¾—ä¸Šä¼ æ¨¡å¼" })
  async uploadMode() {
    return this.ok(await this.file.getMode());
  }
}

src/config/config.default.ts

ts
import { CoolFileConfig, MODETYPE } from "@cool-midway/file";
import { MidwayConfig } from "@midwayjs/core";
import * as fsStore from "cache-manager-fs-hash";

export default {
  // ä¿®æ”¹æˆä½ è‡ªå·±ç‹¬æœ‰çš„key
  keys: "cool-admin for node",
  koa: {
    port: 8001,
  },
  // coolé…ç½®
  cool: {
    file: {
      // ä¸Šä¼ æ¨¡å¼ æœ¬åœ°ä¸Šä¼ æˆ–äº‘å­˜å‚¨
      mode: MODETYPE.LOCAL,
      // æœ¬åœ°ä¸Šä¼  æ–‡ä»¶åœ°å€å‰ç¼€
      domain: "http://127.0.0.1:8001",
    } as CoolFileConfig,
  },
} as unknown as MidwayConfig;

src/modules/demo/controller/app/file.ts

ts
import { Get, Inject, Post, Provide } from "@midwayjs/decorator";
import { CoolController, BaseController } from "@cool-midway/core";
import { Context } from "koa";
import { CoolFile } from "@cool-midway/file";

/**
 * æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
 */
@Provide()
@CoolController()
export class AppDemoFileController extends BaseController {
  @Inject()
  ctx: Context;

  @Inject()
  file: CoolFile;

  @Post("/upload", { summary: "æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ " })
  async uplod() {
    return this.ok(await this.file.upload(this.ctx));
  }
}

      // ä¸Šä¼ æ¨¡å¼ æœ¬åœ°ä¸Šä¼ æˆ–äº‘å­˜å‚¨

        accessKeySecret: "your access secret",
        bucket: "your bucket name",
        endpoint: "oss-cn-hongkong.aliyuncs.com æ¢æˆä½ è‡ªå·±çš„",
        timeout: "3600s",
      } as OSSConfig,
    } as CoolFileConfig,
  },

src/modules/demo/controller/app/file.ts

ts
import { Get, Inject, Post, Provide } from "@midwayjs/decorator";
import { CoolController, BaseController } from "@cool-midway/core";
import { Context } from "koa";
import { CoolFile } from "@cool-midway/file";

/**
 * æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
 */
@Provide()
@CoolController()
export class AppDemoFileController extends BaseController {
  @Inject()
  ctx: Context;

  @Inject()
  file: CoolFile;

  @Post("/upload", { summary: "æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ " })
  async uplod() {
    return this.ok(await this.file.upload(this.ctx));
  }
}

src/modules/demo/controller/app/file.ts

ts
import { Get, Inject, Post, Provide } from "@midwayjs/decorator";
import { CoolController, BaseController } from "@cool-midway/core";
import { Context } from "koa";
import { CoolFile } from "@cool-midway/file";

/**
 * æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
 */
@Provide()
@CoolController()
export class AppDemoFileController extends BaseController {
  @Inject()
  ctx: Context;

  @Inject()
  file: CoolFile;

  @Post("/downAndUpload", { summary: "ä¸‹è½½å¹¶ä¸Šä¼ " })
  async downAndUpload() {
    return this.ok(
      await this.file.downAndUpload("https://cool-js.com/notice.png")
    );
  }
}
